AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dreadsails warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the Dreadsails, admittedly not entirely by choice, at least not anymore. What once seemed like a good idea, a pathway to fame, fortune and glory, [PAWN_nameDef] realised would simply lead to an early grave. Not that [PAWN_nameDef] would even be allowed to rest in death.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dreadsails raider
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived for the battle, for the bloodshed, for the cries of pain. Or at least [PAWN_nameDef] thought [PAWN_pronoun] did. The longer [PAWN_pronoun] served on the Dreadsail, the more obvious it became that death was [PAWN_possessive] life now, and for eternity after.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dreadsails sentinel
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Once a guard at one of the many Maormeri embassies, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to turn to a life of piracy, as working conditions constantly grew worse. [PAWN_pronoun] joined the Dreadsails, which in hindsight was a terrible choice. Unbeknown to [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] had entered a pact of lifelong servitude.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dreadsails tempest
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a literal whirlwind on the battlefield, striking with both blades and magic, none could escape [PAWN_pronoun]. Which made [PAWN_nameDef] the perfect warrior for the Dreadsails.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dreadsails captain
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As both a highly skilled water mage, and a leviathan, [PAWN_nameDef] was the obvious pick for the captain of the Dreadsails, not that the crew really had a say. Many of the crew found it strange that a leviathan would have such an affinity water magic. However none dared bring this up when [PAWN_nameDef] was around.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dreadsails queen
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While the crew of the Dreadsails reported to their captain, there was in fact someone even higher up the food chain, [PAWN_nameDef]. Most of the crew didn't even dare whisper [PAWN_possessive] name, for the crew of the Dreadsails could be split into two main groups. Those that served willingly, and those that served for eternity.
